panels.description: Current Total  Inbound from $Source_IP to Aspera Connect servers ($connect_server)
panels.title: Inbound from $Source_IP

panels.description: Current Total  Outbound from Aspera Connect servers ($connect_server) to  Destination IP : $Source_IP
panels.title: Outbound to $Destination_IP

panels.description: Current Total  Inbound from $Source_IP to Aspera Connect servers ($connect_server)
panels.title: Total Inbound data

panels.description: Current Total  Outbound from Aspera Connect servers ($connect_server) to  Destination IP : $Source_IP
panels.title: Total Outbound Data

targets.query: SELECT last(".aspera.transfer.current") FROM "Aspera_Console" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$SERVER$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

SELECT count("current_rate") FROM "Aspera_Console_Transfer" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$Source_IP$/ AND "destination" = '10.1.6.17' AND "host" =~ /^$SERVER$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "destination"
SELECT last(".aspera.transfer.current") FROM "Aspera_Console" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$SERVER$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

SELECT count("bytes_written") FROM "Aspera_Console_overview" WHERE ("destination" =~ /^$Destination_IP$/ AND "host" =~ /^$SERVER$/ AND "source" =~ /^$Source_IP$/ AND "status" = 'completed') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10m)

panels.title: Bandwidth IN / OUT for the following HSTS : $connect_server

options.content:
DO NOT USE MORE THAN 1 OR 3 HOURS RANGE FOR THE FOLLOWING GRAPHS !
You will otherwise have long loading times

panels.description: Transfers currently running , updated every 5 seconds

targets.query: SELECT mean("current_rate") FROM "Aspera_Console_Transfer" WHERE ("destination" =~ /^$Destination_IP$/ AND "source" =~ /^$Source_IP$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "session_uuid", "name", "source", "contact", "destination" fill(null)

panels.title: Current Transfers Bandwidth -- Source : $Source_IP → Destination : $Destination_IP

panels.description: Percent of Bytes lost for the current transfers

targets.query: SELECT (mean("bytes_lost")) / (mean("bytes_lost") +  mean("bytes_written") +1 )  FROM "Aspera_Console_Transfer" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "session_uuid", "name", "source", ,"contact" fill(none)

panels.title: Transfers Bytes loss - Source : $Source_IP → Destination : $Destination_IP

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "Aspera_Console_overview" WITH KEY = "host"
list.label: host
list.name: SERVER
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "Aspera_Console_overview" WITH KEY = "host"

list.name: connect_server
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "Aspera_Console_Transfer" WITH KEY = "source"

list.name: Source_IP
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "Aspera_Console_Transfer" WITH KEY = "source"

list.name: Destination_IP
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "Aspera_Console_Transfer" WITH KEY = "destination"
